竀字的基本解释

竀
chēng
正视。
古通“赬”：“如鱼竀尾。”

竀
chèng
察视。

竀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chēng］
［《廣韻》丑貞切，平清，徹。］
通“赬1”。亦作“靗1”。
浅赤色。

竀字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　竀； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页868第32
【廣韻】丑庚切【集韻】抽庚切，?音橕。【說文】正視也。　又赤色。【左傳·哀十七年】衞侯卜其繇曰：如魚竀尾。【註】竀，赤色，魚勞則尾赤。【周禮·冬官考工記·鐘氏註】爾雅曰：一染謂之縓，再染謂之竀，三染謂之纁。【爾雅·釋器】作赬，卽淺赤也。　又【廣韻】丑貞切【集韻】癡貞切【正韻】丑成切，?音檉。從穴中正見也。亦作靗。　又【集韻】丑正切，偵去聲。廉視也。

竀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
竀字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yin
chēng
face.
Gu Tong "赪": "Like a fish with a tail."
Yin
chèng
Inspection.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chēng]
["Guangyun" is ugly, pure, clear and thorough. ]
Same as "赪1". Also known as "靗1".
Light red.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Acupoint Word Department] 　竀; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 868 32
[Guangyun] Ugly Gengqie [Jiyun] Pumping Gengqie, sound bar. [Said Wen] Face it.　Red again. [Zuo Zhuan·Ai 17 years] Weihou Bu Qiyou said: Like a fish with a tail. [Note] Red, red, and red tail. [Zhou Li · Dong Guan Kao Gong Ji · Note to Zhong's] Erya said: One dye is called 縓, then dye is called 竀, and three dyes are called 纁. [Erya·Release Device] For a copy, the light is red.　[Guang Yun] Ugly Zhen cut [Ji Yun] Chi Zhen cut [Zheng Yun] Ugly into cut,? Sound tame. See you right from the hole. Also known as Lei.　[Jiyun] Ugly tangent, detective. Lian Shi also.
